parameters.subject: =Dear {{ $('Google Sheets').item.json['Whatâ€™s your name?'].split(' ')[0]  }}, you can also get a customized gift card
parameters.message:
=The Angel Canvas has provided many current and aspiring Angel Investors the tools to succeed and avoid costly mistakes.

We are confident itâ€™ll help your network too.

You can now share it to help a current or aspiring angel.

Angel Canvas Gift Link
https://tally.so/r/n9MY2V

You can also get a personalized gift card to share with a group or someone specific.

Get Custom Gift Card
https://wa.me/573012748971?text=Get+Custom+Gift+Card

Best,
Pedro Bandeira
YAngel CEO
